communications.communication:
Dear FOIA Staff:

Please produce all records related to General Richard Vernon Secord, who pleaded guilty to a felony for lying to Congress about the Iran-Contra Affair. 

General Secord was born on 6 July 1932 in LaRue, Ohio, USA. He died on 15 October 2024.

I request that all fees related to this request be waived. Gen. Secord was a high-ranking Air Force officer and a public figure due to his involvement in the Iran-Contra Affair. News obituaries for Gen. Secord appeared in numerous national news media. His obituary from the Washington Post is attached, as proof of both his death and of his status as a public figure. I have no commercial interest in this request, and I will make all responsive records available to the general public online for free.

Sincerely,

Nicholas Marritz
